entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
